text: wmn al'aerab man yumin biallah wyqrr bwhdanyth wbalbeth baed almwt, walthwab waleqab, wyhtsb ma yunfiq min nafaqat fi jhad almushrikin qasdana biha rida allah wmhbth, wyjelha wasilat 'iilaa duea' alrasul salaa allah ealayh wasalam lh, 'ala 'iina hadhih al'aemal tqrbhm 'iilaa allah teala, sayudkhiluhum allah fi jnth. 'iina allah ghafur lamaa faealuu min alsyyat, rahim bhm
